definitions.definition: A literary piece written in verse .
A piece of writing in the tradition of poetry , an instance of poetry .
A piece of poetic writing , that is with an intensity or depth of expression or inspiration greater than is usual in prose .

main_definition: A literary piece written in verse .
secondary_definitions: A piece of writing in the tradition of poetry , an instance of poetry .
A piece of poetic writing , that is with an intensity or depth of expression or inspiration greater than is usual in prose .
